Package controllers

package controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminController
    This class represents the "backend" to write to files
    BookingController
    This Booking Controller for manipulating data in "movies.txt" database.
    CinemaController
    CinemaController to act as the controller for communication between CinemaUI class and Cinema class.
    CineplexController
    CineplexController to act as the controller for communication between classes.
    LoginController
    This class represents the controller that is used to login a user into the system
    PaymentController
    This Payment Controller is for manipulating data in "moviePrices.txt" database.
    ReviewController
    ReviewController to act as the controller for communication between ReviewUI and Review.
